props.text: There is a bus down the street. The price is quite cheap.

Are you heading to the city center!
I have the best price!
Hi, I need to get to the city center.

No problem.
That will be 20 coins, please.

Hmmm...
What is "new kid on the block"?
props.ans4: The newest person in a group

props.text: Oh. I think  that’s too expensive for me.

You're the new kid on the block, right?
It's the lowest price around.
Thank you!
"New kid on the block" is a newcomer, the newest person in a group.
Yes. I've just arrived here.
If you give me 15 coins, I'll drive you to the city center and I'll tell you my favorite idiom about driving.
I don't have 15 coins now
Will I take the taxi?
No, thank you.
Yes. Let's go!

Thanks!
My favorite idiom is "backseat driver".

Now let's go.
I hope you're not a backseat driver.

Good job, Foxy!
You've just completed the quest and found a hidden "backseat driver" idiom.
You didn't speak with all people around, so you didn't find all idioms on the level.
Do I want to finish the level?
Backseat driver is a passenger in a car who comments about the driver's actions during the ride.
Maybe ask the driver about lowering the price?
What about 10 coins for a ride?
I'll give you 5 coins for a ride.
What if I gave you 15 coins for a ride?

This isn't possible!
You just made me angry, young lady.

Sorry young lady, I won’t accept anything less than 17 coins
for a ride.
I don't have 17 coins...
They annoy me.

KEEP CALM
and
BUY A
BALLOON!

Oh my god!
YOU are HERE!!!

Hey!
I'm pulling your leg.
It's just a costume.
Oh I see…
What does "I'm pulling your leg" mean...?
props.ans4: I'm using the Force to pull your leg

props.text:
KEEP CALM
and
BUY A
BALLOON!
I've got the power!

Come to the
Dark Side!
We have balloons!

I'm saving money to build another
Death Star.

Come to the
Dark Side!
We have balloons!
Funny! But wrong, try again
"To pull someone's leg" means to joke with someone!
Hot kebab! Hot kebab!
Mommy told me you make it from cats sometimes.
Put a sock in it!
“Put a sock in it” means
props.ans1: Put a sock in the kebab!

props.text: Hot kebab! Hot kebab!

Fresh kebab!
It’s made from the best lamb meat.
It’s the best meat in the city!
I am a liar...
I can make ten kebabs in one minute!

My boy wants to be an ice cream seller.
What a shame!
"Put a sock in it" is a request to be quiet.
Foxy is a journalist. She’s arrived in London to collect English idioms.
Talk to London people and when they use an idiom, try to guess the right meaning of it!
Hello, Mr. Policeman!
How may I help you?
Could you tell me how can I get to the city center?
It's a piece of cake. Just go forward...

What could
"piece of cake"
mean?

It was the first idiom on the level!

Talk to people, guess and learn all the 5 idioms!
Let's start our journey. Get closer to the policeman and ask the way to the city center.
Some passengers jump over this wall. Is it ok?
We have one fox working in our department...
If you have nothing to do, just get a job.
Looks like an idiom!
Foxy is a journalist. She’s arrived in London to collect English idioms. Now press the right arrow to continue.
"Piece of cake" means something very easy!
Hello, Mr. Policeman!
How may I help you?
Could you tell me how can I get to the city center?
It's a piece of cake. Just go forward...
Looks like an idiom!

What could
"piece of cake"
mean?
"Piece of cake" means something very easy!
The Ferris wheel is free to enter, Foxy!
Life is like that Ferris wheel; it goes up and down, round and round...
... and it can take your breath away!
"Take your breath away" means…
The Ferris wheel is free to enter, Foxy!

Some people say that the Ferris wheel is too fast. 
Want to check?
Sometimes I worry about woodpeckers because of my wooden leg
Yo-ho-ho, and a bottle of rum!
"Take your breath away" means to extremely surprise and amaze you!
Yes, it does.
So I can't let you get on the bus
The bus is leaving now

Hello!
Does this bus go to the city center?
5 coins please

You need to have 5
coins to buy a bus ticket.
No, thank you.
Do I want to finish the level?
You didn't speak with all people around, so you didn't find all idioms on the level.
No, thanks.

params.name: hint
params.value: Try to speak with the policeman

params.name: meaning
params.value: A newcomer, the newest person in a group

params.name: hint
params.value: Try to speak with the taxi driver

params.name: hint
params.value: Try to speak with the balloon seller

params.name: meaning
params.value: To extremely surprise and amaze you

params.name: hint
params.value: Try to speak with the captain

params.name: hint
params.value: Try to speak with the kebab seller

props.text:
But look...
Here are brand new glasses!

What a mess here...
:(

You've just found a secret!

There is one for each level. Be curious and find cool things!
Find and collect coins to get bonuses and complete quests.
I want to buy a new dress...
Waiting for the bus...
What a beautiful girl!
